comment.author: 43688219@N00
comment._content: It would appear this church is no longer there. The church in Vardø dates back to 1307 when the oldest known church was consecrated. Several churches have been on this site. The previous church from 1869 was burned down by the retreating Germans near the end of World War II. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vard%C3%B8_Church en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Vard%C3%B8_(town)
